main.description:
Satisfy your wanderlust at Coron’s exclusive beachfront resort. Enjoy sun-drenched retreats, picnic lunches and leisure activities as you fall in love with the infinite blue skies and translucent waters kissing the glistening sand. If the 700 meter sweep of seemingly endless white sand is not enough, seek the resort map and explore the hidden beaches of our tropical paradise.

Revered for its rich marine life, Discovery Coron serves as a turtle sanctuary from December to February. During the nesting season, endangered sea turtles visit the island’s shores and lay eggs at night. With our strong commitment to protecting biological diversity, these eggs are fenced and baby turtles are released and guided to the sea with the help of our guests.

attributes.value:

With our strong commitment to protecting biological diversity, these eggs are fenced and baby turtles are released and guided to the sea with the help of our guests.

main.description:
A canvas of blue skies, azure seas and lush greenery set the postcard-perfect scenery of Discovery Coron’s outdoor pool.

Designed with a shallow beach entry with depths of 4 to 6 feet, the freshwater pool is surrounded with parasols, cocktail tables and sun loungers, making it the perfect place to soak in the splendor of Coron.

Cocktails and refreshments are available by the poolside.

Open 24 hours daily unless under treatment.

main.description:
The dugong or sea cow is a large marine mammal that was almost hunted to extinction. They remain vulnerable to this day due to poaching, drowning in fishing nets, loss of habitat and boat collisions. It was the first marine mammal to become protected by the Philippine law in 1991.

Over the past three months, dugongs have been regularly coming to the calm grass sea beds found around Discovery Coron.

These majestic mermaids are still nervous so it is very important that you stay close to your guide and follow any instruction that they give you. We try our best to encourage them to keep visiting the waters of Discovery Coron. Dugongs have poor eyesight and so they can be spooked easily by sudden movements and loud noises.

They are the only vegetarian marine mammals and they feed entirely on sea grass. They have to eat up to 50 kg of grass a day so observing proper interaction is important so as not to interfere with their feeding habits.

 

Dugong Watching

WATCHING GUIDELINES:

  • Only four guests will be allowed in the water with the animal/s at any time (regardless if they are using scuba or snorkeling gear).
  • Maintain a five-meter distance at all times from the animal.
  • Do not chase the animal/s. If the animal displays avoidant and/or distressed behaviors such as trying to swim away, stop swimming towards them and and do not chasing the animal.
  • Do not swim in front of the animal/s, especially if they are on their way to the surface.
  • Observe the animal silently. (e.g. calm fin use, no jumping from the boat, no talking in the water)
  • Do not touch the animal/s.
  • The animal/s should be the one to choose to come close to you. This is not the decision of the guides or tourists.
  • Guides and tourists must not cause or act in any manner that may cause an adult dugong and a calf to become separated, or individual dugongs to be separated from the herd.
  • Get the chance to meet the gentle Sea Cow or Dugong in an unforgettable snorkeling experience at Calauit Island. Then hop to Diatoy Island for a hearty Filipino lunch by the beach.Don’t forget to bring a pair of your hiking shoes to check out the new Bamboo Hiking Trail — once at the top, you’ll see breathtaking views of the ocean and the surrounding islands.

button_items.description: *Rates and schedules are subject to change without prior notice

main.description:
Put another dimension to your time in paradise and let your children experience what happens behind the scenes of running a resort. Let them learn important skills as they have fun and eventually develop a greater appreciation and understanding of the world around them.

The Junior Hotelier’s Program covers the following areas of operation and courses:

  • Front Office:
    • Butler Buddy
    • Making Discoveries
  • Culinary
    • Junior Chef
  • Food and Beverage
    • Mini Me
  • Housekeeping
    • Origami Master
    • Linen Master
    • Discovery Kid Eco Warrior
    • Turndown Discovery
    • Tree Planting Warrior
    • Beach Guardians

A child who completes a total of three to four courses will receive a Junior Hotelier’s Certificate plus exclusive membership to the Junior Hotelier’s Club, which entitles the child to exclusive perks and privileges on the family’s next visit.

For inquiries on the program, email cp.frontoffice@discovery.com.ph

#JrHotelierClub

main.description: Sail along the tranquil turquoise waters of Dimakya Island, home of Discovery Coron, and journey around the nearby Malpagalen Island. Take in Coron’s magnificent sunset views as your share a bottle of wine with your friends or with your special someone.

button_items.description: *Rates and schedules are subject to change without prior notice.

attributes.value: Sail along the tranquil turquoise waters of Dimakya Island, home of Discovery Coron, and journey around the nearby Malpagalen Island. Take in Coron’s magnificent sunset views as your share a bottle of wine with your friends or with your special someone.

Sail along the tranquil turquoise waters of Dimakya Island, home of Discovery Coron, and journey around the nearby Malpagalen Island. Take in Coron’s magnificent sunset views as your share a bottle of wine with your friends or with your special someone.
*Rates and schedules are subject to change without prior notice.

main.description:
Explore the Philippines’ game reserve and wildlife sanctuary in Calauit Safari Park, a 3,700 hectare island off the coast of Palawan. It is home to various species of exotic African and endemic Palawan flora and fauna where hundreds of giraffes, elans, waterbucks, Calamian deer, monkeys, fresh water crocodiles, zebras, bear cats, bushbuck and a variety of birds roam freely. This tropical safari should not be missed on your visit to Coron.

Package includes personal tour guides, boat transfers, use of tour vehicle, park entrance, snacks and short lecture, taxes and service charge.

Schedule of Trips

Morning trips are scheduled at 7:00 am. Early breakfast will be served before you leave the resort. Kindly advise the Front Desk if you need a wake-up call. Afternoon trips are scheduled at 1:00 pm.

The whole trip takes about 5-6 hours, depending on sea conditions. A tour can accommodate four to 30 persons per trip.

 

Terms and Conditions

  • The Calauit Office is closed Saturdays and Sundays.
  • All tours desired to be taken from Saturday to Monday mornings should be reserved by Friday afternoon.
  • All reservations received later than Friday afternoon will be confirmed Monday morning at 10:00am.

For reservations, please call 0998 844 7138 or (+63 2) 8519 5674 to 76.

The Calauit Safari Tour is operated by Discovery Coron Divers.

button_items.description:
*Rates and schedules are subject to change without prior notice.

 

Exclusive boat arrangements shall be charged accordingly and is subject to availability

For your security, non-resort accredited boats are not allowed within the premises of Dimakya island, home of Club Paradise Palawan

title: Timmy’s Island Adventure on Roblox Metaverse

main.description:
Discovery Coron enters the metaverse!

Guests now have the opportunity to explore Discovery Coron through the virtual realm as we enter the Roblox metaverse with Timmy’s Island Adventure. Both children and those young at heart can immerse themselves in this enjoyable and thrilling universe alongside their loved ones!

The new game features a virtual representation of the resort and provides an interactive experience for guests to explore Dimakya Island while playing. From swimming with sea turtles and dugong, taking selfies using the in-game camera, to connecting with other players in multiplayer mode and completing challenges together.

There are lots of wonderful surprises awaiting those who explore Discovery Coron within the game. Special freebies at the resort are also up for grabs when players complete the game. 

Download the Roblox app now and we will see you in the World of Discovery’s metaverse game!

main.description:
Experience the precious ecosystems, sheer beauty and tranquility of one of the world’s great natural playgrounds, Palawan. Discover three uniquely beautiful private islands perfect for true connoisseurs of indulgently laid-back escape: Dimalanta Island, Malpagalen Island and Diatoy Island.

Malpagalen Island

Dimalanta Island

Sunbathing by Diatoy Island

main.description:
We take our diving seriously at Discovery Coron. Our house reefs have been protected for the over 15 years and thus boast a healthy profusion of fish life as well as “critters” dear to macro photographers. Right off the beach is a sea grass field, an area in which dugongs and turtles like to graze. Half an hour away is the Kyokuzan maru, one of 12 dive-able wrecks from World War II.

Our dive shop, operated by Discovery Coron Divers, is staffed and fully equipped to host your scuba diving holiday whether you are an aspiring diver or someone who has logged over a thousand dives.

button_items.description:
For inquiries, contact Discovery Coron Divers at 0998 844 7138

Earn your next getaway!

main.description:
Equipped with cardio and strength training equipment, our Fitness Facility can be a perfect place to enhance your mental and physical well-being, allowing you to stay fit and healthy while on vacation.

Click here to learn more about our Home Safe sanitation procedures and general guidelines in using the gym.

attributes.value:
Equipped with cardio and strength training equipment, our Fitness Facility can be a perfect place to enhance your mental and physical well-being, allowing you to stay fit and healthy while on vacation.

Click here to learn more about our Home Safe sanitation procedures and general guidelines in using the gym.

main.description:
Discover Dimakya Island’s colorful flora and fauna as you embark on one adventure after another. Take an exhilarating climb to the hiking trail and reward yourself with awe-inspiring views as you reach the Eagle’s Point, the island’s highest peak.

The Eagle’s Point overlooks Discovery Coron and Coron’s stellar islets cradled by shades of blue. Best viewed from this vantage point are Isla Walang Lang-Aw (Island without Trees) and Coron’s glorious sunsets.

attributes.value:
Discover Dimakya Island’s colorful flora and fauna as you embark on one adventure after another. Take an exhilarating climb to the hiking trail and reward yourself with awe-inspiring views as you reach the Eagle’s Point, the island’s highest peak.

The Eagle’s Point overlooks Discovery Coron and Coron’s stellar islets cradled by shades of blue. Best viewed from this vantage point are Isla Walang Lang-Aw (Island without Trees) and Coron’s glorious sunsets.

main.description:
Wake up to the sound of the waves crashing and spend the morning in deep meditation. Stretch your body and practice yoga by the beach at the resort’s Yoga Zone. With a perfect view of the azure, clear waters, the expansive beachfront and the mountain ridges right next to Dimakya island, it’s the perfect spot to do these movement, meditation, and breathing techniques that promote mental and physical well-being

Leave all your stress and worries behind. The ocean has a natural way of relaxing the mind, body and spirit. Practicing yoga at the beach can help bring you to a peaceful state of being.

main.description:
Indulge in a blissful journey to wellness and delight in pure pampering.

An oasis of serenity tucked amid the sun-kissed glamor of the island, the Glow Spa at Discovery Coron offers a divine menu of heavenly treatments guaranteed to kindle the harmony of the mind, body and spirit. The signature “Four Hands” treatment with two massage therapists features choreographed techniques to simultaneously revitalize your tired body. For holistic healing and rejuvenation, the Organic Massage uses an herbal ball bundled from carefully selected medicinal leaves and spices found in Coron.

Glow Spa has recently partnered with Above Aesthetics Clinic (AAC)  to develop detoxification and rejuvenating treatments focusing on the different areas of the body. These treatments include stress management, anti-aging, and wrinkle management by combining oriental and western techniques.

 

At Glow Spa, you can enjoy natural pampering while protecting the environment as only 100 percent natural coconut oil is used in its rejuvenating treatment selections, instead of synthetic scented oils that can harm the environment and or even irritate the skin. Pure oil is extracted from the coconut by carefully cooking it for at least three hours. The coconut is sourced from women of Barangay Cheey in Coron, Palawan, who rely on coconut for their livelihood and additional income. The arrangement also helps their community.

Take pleasure in the luxurious textures, healing touches and luscious oils and fragrances unique to the island.

 

Open from 10:00 am to 10:00 pm.

Open from 10:00 am to 10:00 pm.

main.description:
Indulge in a blissful journey to wellness and delight in pure pampering with Discovery Coron’s Beauty & Wellness program.

With a focus on health and wellness, Discovery Coron has partnered with Above Aesthetics Clinic (AAC) under health advocate and cosmetic surgeon, Dr. Conrada Veruasa-Apostol, M.D.. A member of the Asian Pacific Academy of Cosmetic Surgery, of the American Academy of Cosmetic Surgery, and of the American Academy of Aesthetic Medicine, Dr. Veruasa-Apostol, also known as Dr. Radi, trained on Reconstructive surgery under Dr. Rajan Dulamal. She had her fellowship training at Vanderbilt University Hospital in Tenessee, Mt. Sinai Hospital and Beth Israel Hospital in New York.

Among her many trainings and further studies include stress management; anti-aging and wrinkle management; cosmetic acupuncture for facial wrinkles, as well as breast augmentation and weight loss at the Wangjing Hospital, China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences; and lifestyle medicine for weight management at the Harvard Medical School in Boston.

Below are detoxification and rejuvenating treatments that were developed by Discovery Coron with Above Aesthetics Clinic (AAC), focusing on the different areas of the body:

 

Visage

  • Stress Relief Facial

    Php 5,550 (45 minutes)

    A relaxing facial combining oriental and western techniques which aims to open energy meridians that are usually blocked due to stress, this procedure relaxes the vital organs thus energizing the body and boosting the immune system. The treatment consists of acupressure massages of the chest, shoulders, upper arms, upper back, neck, scalp, ears and face. Lotion containing organic collagen, vitamin E, lactic acid, hydrating toner and calamine lotion is applied to nourish the face. Galvanic with ultrasonic gadget is used to aid in the absorption of the nourishment and to tone the facial skin. Toxins and impurities from the face and anterior neck are sucked out using a vacuum. Ice roller or cryo sticks are then used to close the pores. At the end of the treatment, one feels and looks refreshed.

 

  • Facial Detox

    Php 5,050 (30 minutes)

    An oriental technique of releasing toxins that cause aging, melasma breakouts, wrinkles, dryness, oiliness, acne, and psoriasis, this procedure consists of acupressure massage of the face, head, neck and shoulder with sweeping movements toward the lymphatic drainage using bian stone, jade gua sha, or animal horn. Essential oil is applied to the face and neck while doing the lymphatic drainage massage of the areas.

 

Body Rituals

  • Neck and Shoulder Rejuvenation

    Php 7,000 (45 minutes)

    The treatment relaxes the muscle by manipulation through acupressure, electronic facial gun or other gadget that releases tightness. A lymphatic drainage using gua sha technique is then applied. This treatment helps alleviate headache, dizziness, fatigue, vertigo, and insomnia.
  • Tight Back and Shoulder Rejuvenation

    Php 7,000 (45 minutes)

    The treatment works by relaxing the muscles through manipulation and deep acupressure to unblock energy meridians. This method and the use of a fascial gun, releases the fascia that envelopes the right muscles. After which, heat followed by cold application softens the tight muscles. This treatment can improve blood circulation and eliminate toxins, improve flexibility, promote good sleep and enhance the immune system.

 

Foot Care

  • Foot Detox with Foot Reflex

    Php 5,860 (60 minutes)

    This kind of detoxification releases toxins from the pores of the soles of the feet by soaking them in a basin of warm water with magnesium sulfate, and essential oils followed by a foot reflex. It involves pressure on the trigger points on the feet. Most of the toxins are lodged in the feet by gravity, which need to be eliminated by unblocking through deep acupressure.
